commentAnnotations.text: Rationale for changing zinc washout period from 30 to 21 days: To align the number of days with the mention of zinc discontinuation elsewhere in the protocol.
Abbreviations: ALT = alanine aminotransferase; AST = aspartate aminotransferase; IB = Investigatorâ€™s Brochure; PK = pharmacokinetics; WD = Wilson disease.
commentAnnotations.sourceSection: Table 3: Potential Risks and Mitigation Strategy

commentAnnotations.text: Adaptive Feature: The Outpatient Period (Day 9 to Day 23) may be extended up to an additional 14 days with Investigator approval.
Abbreviations: CRF = case report form; CRU = clinical research unit; EOS = End of Study; SoA = Schedule of Activities.
Abbreviations: ICF = informed consent form; PD = pharmacodynamic; PK = pharmacokinetic.

Note on Accumulation Ratio calculation: total molybdenum and PUF molybdenum concentration-time profiles on Day 28 after the last 15 mg ALXN1840 dose will be extrapolated to Day 29 (0-24 hr) and subtracted from the observed Day 29 concentration-time profiles after the first 30 mg dose.

studyDefinitionDocumentVersions.description: Clarify study procedures across US sites to facilitate participant recruitment and lessen inconvenience for participants.
